title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Harbaugh 2-Point Controversy, Dak and Dunk 2.0, Mike Silver on Week 15, Urban's Flameout, NFL COVID Chaos
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Harbaugh 2-Point Controversy, Dak and Dunk 2.0, Mike Silver on Week 15, Urban's Flameout, NFL COVID Chaos
description:
Colin gives his takes on the Ravens' narrow loss to the Packers, a telling stat about Dak Prescott (3:00), what Mac Jones and Tua Tagovailoa are showing the league (5:00), and why the 49ers have become the most fascinating team (10:00). Then longtime NFL writer Mike Silver joins Colin to discuss that failed Ravens 2-pt conversion (13:00), whether the 49ers will trade Jimmy G now that he's turning it around (17:00), the potential sleeper team in the AFC (28:00), the issues with the NFL shifting games due to COVID (30:00), why Urban Meyer flamed out with the Jaguars (40:00, and the story behind Mike's book which became the new movie "American Underdog" (45:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
